#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int count1=0;
int a[10000][10000];
int func(int i,int j,int n)
{
if(i==n-1 && j==n-1)
{
	
	count1++;
	a[i][j]=0;
	return 1;
}
if(j+1<n && a[i][j+1]==0)
{
	a[i][j]=1;
	func(i,j+1,n);
	a[i][j]=0;
}

if(i+1<n && a[i+1][j]==0)
{
	a[i][j]=1;
	func(i+1,j,n);
	a[i][j]=0;
}

if(i-1>=0 && a[i-1][j]==0)
{
	a[i][j]=1;
	func(i-1,j,n);
	a[i][j]=0;
}

if(j-1>=0 && a[i][j-1]==0)
{
	a[i][j]=1;
	func(i,j-1,n);
	a[i][j]=0;
}
}
int main() {

	// your code goes here
int n;
cin>>n;
int i;
int j;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
	for(j=0;j<n;j++)
	{
	cin>>a[i][j];
	}
}
if(a[0][0] || a[n-1][n-1])
cout<<"0";
else
{
func(0,0,n);
cout<<count1;
}
return 0;
}
